name: Dragon Dodgers
description:
A short one-screen game about dodging dragons and collecting coins.

Collect 10 coins to gain a win.

See how many wins you can get before a game-over!

Arrow keys to move

The apple gives you 60 seconds of jump boost, which increases your jump height

Press P to pause the game and see your stats

When you die, click on the next letter in your selected game mode to continue
